verbose_text: In the subsequent experiments, it was demonstrated that downregulation of CKS1B could inhibit the activation of the MEK / ERK signaling pathway, which exhibited an increased expression of PCNA, cyclin D1, VEGF and bFGF, thus inhibiting the proliferation, migration, invasion and angiogenesis of RB cells.
evidence: CKS1B could inhibit the activation of the MEK
